model:Model.model:Query: SELECT t1.*, menudetail_title, menudetail_titleLink, menudetail_linkDescription, menudetail_isVisible, (SELECT count(*) FROM ##TABLE_PREFIX##menus_tbl as t2 WHERE t2.menu_parentId = t1.menu_id) as numChild FROM ##TABLE_PREFIX##menus_tbl as t1 INNER JOIN ##TABLE_PREFIX##menudetails_tbl ON (menudetail_FK_menu_id=menu_id) WHERE t1.menu_parentId=:menuId AND menudetail_FK_language_id=:languageId ORDER BY t1.menu_order, t1.menu_id
